item.title: Standard Chartered Bank is launching credit cards in China
item.description:
Standard Chartered Bank has launched its credit card services in China, focusing on the mid-range and high-end consumer market. These new credit cards blend international and local features. The bank aims to give customers special shopping and dining offers at over 1,000 locations by merging resources and platforms across mainland China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. Recognizing the growth of online shopping and shifting consumer habits, Standard Chartered provides cardholders with the convenience of online payments and cashback rewards...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/standard-chartered-bank-is-launching-credit-cards-in-china/
